::Zardus::

"Excellent," Zardus replies, "There is a tech bot in the Alliance 
named Wheeljack. If you could work with him to design a good battle 
system around the island to discourage invaders by sea, it will be 
very useful."

He taps his comm, sending a message to Wheeljack. "Wheeljack, could 
you report to my position please?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer::
> 
>      Ah, yes, I'm sure I could help out in some way," Composer said.
